name: Glimmer
overrideDescription: Restore [effect0.power] health to friendly units and deal [effect1.power] damage to enemy units.
cardLoreTooltips: If struck by a surge of electricity, a Sapwood will crystallize into glass. The sap within will become preserved as a supercharged healing solvent. But I can't seem to break the glass without losing much of this sap in the process.
